database module

class database.Database(file)[source]

Bases: object

This Class creates a connection to the database and provides methods to add, edit and remove modules, students and grades.

addModule(name, beschreibung, leistung, ects)[source]

This method adds a module. :param name: the module’s name :param beschreibung: the module’s description :param leistung: the type of exam for the module :param ects: the module’s ects :return: True if the module was added, False if the module already exists

addStudent(studiengang, vorname, nachname, email, password)[source]

This method adds a student to the database. :param studiengang: the student’s study program :param vorname: the student’s first name :param nachname: the student’s last name :param email: the student’s email :param password: the student’s password :return: True if the student was added, False if the student already exists

addStudentModule(studentID, moduleID, semester)[source]

This method adds a student to a module. :param studentID: the student’s id :param moduleID: the module’s id :param semester: the semester :return: True if the student was added, False if the student was already in the module in the same semester

editModule(name, beschreibung, leistung, ects, id)[source]

This method edits a module. :param name: the new module’s name :param beschreibung: the new module’s description :param leistung: the new module’s type of exam :param ects: the new module’s ects :param id: the module’s id :return: True if the module was edited, False if the module does not exist

editStudent(studiengang, vorname, nachname, password, email)[source]

This method edits a student. :param studiengang: the new student’s study program :param vorname: the new student’s first name :param nachname: the new student’s last name :param password: the new student’s password :param email: the new student’s email :return: True if the student was edited, False if the student does not exist

editStudentModule(studentID, moduleID, note)[source]

This method edits a student module combination. :param studentID: the student’s id :param moduleID: the module’s id :param note: the student’s grade :return: True if the student module combination was edited, False if the student module combination does not exist

getModule(id)[source]

This method gets the module by the id. :param id: the module’s id :return: the module or False if the module does not exist

getModuleId(name)[source]

This method gets the module id from the module name. :param name: the module’s name :return: the module id or False if the module does not exist

getModules(studentID, semester)[source]

This method gets all modules of the student by the student id and semester. :param studentID: the student’s id :param semester: the semester :return: the modules of the student

getModulesByStudentID(studentID)[source]

This method gets all modules of the student by the student id. The semester is not needed. :param studentID: the student’s id :return: all modules of the student

getStudentData(email)[source]

This method gets the student data from the email. :param email: the student’s email :return: the student data or False if the student does not exist

getStudentId(email)[source]

This method gets the student id from the email. :param email: the student’s email :return: the student id or False if the student does not exist

getStudentMail(id)[source]

This method gets the student email from the id. :param id: the student’s id :return: the student email or False if the student does not exist

getTableModules()[source]

‘ This method shows the modules table. :return: the modules table

getTableStudents()[source]

This method shows the students table. :return: the students table

removeModule(id)[source]

‘ This method removes a module. :param id: the module’s id :return: True if the module was removed, False if the module does not exist

removeStudent(id)[source]

This method removes a student. :param id: the student’s id :return: True if the student was removed, False if the student does not exist

removeStudentModule(studentID, moduleID)[source]

This method removes a student from a module. :param studentID: the student’s id :param moduleID: the module’s id :return: True if the student was removed, False if the student module combination does not exist

validateStudent(email, password)[source]

This method validates a student. :param email: the student’s email :param password: the student’s password :return: True if the student exists and the password is correct, False if the student does not exist or the password is wrong
